summary: This document is an amendment and restatement of the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2014 Trust, detailing the terms of the trust, including provisions for income and principal disbursement, specific bequests, and the roles of trustees. It outlines the distribution of assets upon Epstein's death and includes various financial obligations and provisions for beneficiaries.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Grantor of the trust, establishing its terms and conditions.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is one of the Trustees responsible for managing the trust according to Epstein's directives.

persons.name: James E. Staley
persons.context: James E. Staley serves as a Trustee of the trust, involved in its administration.

persons.name: David Mitchell
persons.context: David Mitchell is another Trustee tasked with overseeing the trust's operations.

persons.name: Karyna Shuliak
persons.context: Karyna Shuliak is named as a beneficiary in the trust, set to receive specific bequests.

persons.name: Celina Edith Dubin
persons.context: Celina Edith Dubin is a beneficiary who is to receive significant assets from the trust.

persons.name: Richard D. Kahn
persons.context: Richard D. Kahn is mentioned as a beneficiary entitled to receive distributions from the trust.

persons.name: Lesley Katherine Groff
persons.context: Lesley Katherine Groff is listed as a beneficiary in the trust agreement.

persons.name: Lawrence Paul Visoski, Jr.
persons.context: Lawrence Paul Visoski, Jr. is named as a beneficiary who will receive a bequest.

persons.name: Eva Andersson Dubin
persons.context: Eva Andersson Dubin is mentioned as a contingent beneficiary who may receive assets if other beneficiaries do not survive.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Grantor of the trust, and Darren K. Indyke serves as one of the Trustees managing the trust.
James E. Staley is a Trustee appointed by Jeffrey E. Epstein to manage the trust.
David Mitchell is a Trustee of the trust established by Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Darren K. Indyke is mentioned in connection with financial obligations related to Karyna Shuliak.
Celina Edith Dubin is a beneficiary, and Eva Andersson Dubin is a contingent beneficiary related to her.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, New York, New York 10021

49 Zorro Ranch Road, Stanley, New Mexico 87056
358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, Florida
keyFacts: The trust is established by Jeffrey E. Epstein and includes provisions for income and principal disbursement during his lifetime and after his death.
Darren K. Indyke, James E. Staley, and David Mitchell are appointed as Trustees of the trust.
Specific bequests are made to various individuals, including Karyna Shuliak and Celina Edith Dubin.
The trust includes provisions for the cancellation of loans made by Epstein to certain individuals upon his death.
The trust directs that upon Epstein's death, the remaining assets will be distributed to beneficiaries, including educational institutions.
